DataElement.preferredName: OME Tagged Image File Format Channel Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A tagged image file format (TIFF) image file format that contains an Open Microscopy Environment (OME) XML metadata block in the file header for storing microscopy information (pixels and metadata) using the OME Data Model._A channel represents an independent acquisition scheme for the ImageAcquisition event, typically a wavelength.:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: OME Tagged Image File Format Channel
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tagged image file format (TIFF) image file format that contains an Open Microscopy Environment (OME) XML metadata block in the file header for storing microscopy information (pixels and metadata) using the OME Data Model._A channel represents an independent acquisition scheme for the ImageAcquisition event, typically a wavelength.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Open Microscopy Environment Tagged Image File Format
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tagged image file format (TIFF) image file format that contains an Open Microscopy Environment (OME) XML metadata block in the file header for storing microscopy information (pixels and metadata) using the OME Data Model.

Concepts.longName: Open Microscopy Environment Tagged Image File Format
Concepts.definition: A tagged image file format (TIFF) image file format that contains an Open Microscopy Environment (OME) XML metadata block in the file header for storing microscopy information (pixels and metadata) using the OME Data Model.

Property.preferredDefinition: A channel represents an independent acquisition scheme for the ImageAcquisition event, typically a wavelength.

Concepts.definition: An independent acquisition scheme, i.e., a route or conduit through which flows data consisting of one particular measurement using one particular parameter.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2/25/22 jk apprvd by SME, released for SRRS imaging data set. 10/5/21 jk HTAN Level 2 imaging data element, created for SRRS imaging data set.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/13/20 jk remove MCL Genomic CSI.  7-8-18 tt added MCL CSI. 11/19/18 jk added MCL CSI reference.  8/3/17 tt transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Gwen Dean, added CSI and reg status per Round 5 finalization task.
